vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_10.sol#14-21):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_10.sol#18)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_10.sol#20)
	- userBalances (patch_10.sol#19)
